<div>   
<p>京东京造 512GB SSD 固态硬盘日常售价 599 元，今日数码大促直降至 399 元：<a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=/pages/union/proxy/proxy?spreadUrl=https%3a%2f%2funion-click.jd.com%2fjdc%3fe%3d%26p%&EA_PTAG=17078.27.380" data-jdid="100011216263">点此查看</a>。</p><p>采用 PCIe 3.0 四通道规格，M.2 接口（NVMe 1.4 标准），读取速度 3200MB/s、写入速度 2400MB/s。</p><p><a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank">京东数码会场</a>可领白条 24 期免息券（<span class="accentTextColor">结算后，付款收银台时可用</span>），折合 16.6 元/月。</p><p>关于颗粒问题，一乖咨询了下客服：</p><p><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/8/5f8b2f02-a000-43b5-9ace-8943ee5a7df3.png"
